programme.title: L'avenir nous appartient
programme.desc:
Episode 1

Paul Arcand opens the doors of his studio. Jean-Martin Fortier, organic farming pioneer, offers online lessons in market gardening. Élodie and Stephan apply the principles of joint custody. Régine Laurent returns to the Santa Cabrini Hospital where her commitment to the trade union movement first began.

Directed by: Jean-François Poisson (Canada, 2021)

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
On the trail of the slag heaps

Certain regions are carried by a history that changed them dramatically and imposed a strong identity. Such is the case of the Nord, its recent history indelibly marked by coal. We explore the area around Douai, where garden cities rub shoulders with the red-brick cathedrals of the mining towns.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: La peinture française autour du monde
Littoral
programme.desc:
Sept-Îles, protecting the seabirds
Just offshore from Brittany's Côte de Granit Rose, the Sept-Îles archipelago is a nature reserve that offers a safe haven for the largest population of seabirds in metropolitan France. No easy matter, when we know that between 1950 and 2010, the global seabird population declined by nearly 70%. Report by: Corentin Pichon.
Presented by: Marine Barnérias.

programme.title: C Jamy
programme.desc:
How to eat better?
What's a calorie? Why are we so attracted to fat and sugar? And what happens inside our body when we lose weight? Jamy and his experts analyse our dietary habits and their effects on our organism.
Presented by: Jamy Gourmaud.

programme.title: Un opéra pour un empire
programme.desc: Famous for its ghost, Opéra Garnier was a titanic construction project and showcase for the Second Empire. From 1852 to 1870, Paris became the capital of modernity. Behind the scenes, machinery, architectural details and legends, we look back at the building of the opera house designed by Charles Garnier. Directed by: Patrick Cabouat (France, 2020)

programme.title: C Jamy
programme.desc:
How to eat better?
What's a calorie? Why are we so attracted to fat and sugar? And what happens inside our body when we lose weight? Jamy and his experts analyse our dietary habits and their effects on our organism.
Presented by: Jamy Gourmaud.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc:
Sept-Îles, protecting the seabirds
Just offshore from Brittany's Côte de Granit Rose, the Sept-Îles archipelago is a nature reserve that offers a safe haven for the largest population of seabirds in metropolitan France. No easy matter, when we know that between 1950 and 2010, the global seabird population declined by nearly 70%. Report by: Corentin Pichon.
Presented by: Marine Barnérias.

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: A forest of sound How to pay attention to the music that floats in the air, behind each object, behind each movement?

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: Le petit peintre et le pinceau magique

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Treasure hunt
Rocky and Lily have received a mysterious treasure map and are trying to understand it. Just how far are they going to have to go to find the treasure hidden by Captain Kidd, the famous pirate?
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Échappées belles
programme.desc: Costa Rica, naturally Nestling between North and South America, the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, Costa Rica is a fabulous destination rich in both nature and adventure. This little country is home to 5% of the world's biodiversity and nearly 33% of its surface area is covered by nature reserves and national parks. Presented by: Sophie Jovillard. Directed by: Fred Mianne (season 15, France, 2020)

programme.title: Voir le jour
programme.desc:
Assistant on a maternity ward in Marseille, Jeanne and her colleagues fight day and night to support the mothers and their babies despite staff shortages and constant pressure from management. When tragedy strikes, Jeanne's secret past resurfaces. From now on she'll firmly stand by the choices made throughout her life.

Directed by: Marion Laine (France, 2019)

Cast: Sandrine Bonnaire, Brigitte Roüan, Aure Atika, Sarah Stern

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: Six degrés
programme.desc:
Episode 4: A parent to inspire
Ricardo has to choose a member of his family who inspires him for a French project, which leads him to question his mother about his biological father. Léon learns a little more about the relationship between his parents.
Directed by: Hervé Baillargeon (Canada, 2021) Cast: Noah Parker (Léon), Francesca Barcenas (Julietta), Alexandre Goyette (Francis), Anthony Therrien (Ricardo), Catherine Trudeau (Marianne), Amaryllis Tremblay (Florence), Léanne Désilets (Doris)

programme.title: Six degrés
programme.desc:
Episode 5: The body for the job
Julietta is hesitant about including Bélinda in the photo shoot she's preparing for her store. Worried about the cost to his family of his new accessibility equipment, Léon finds himself a job.
Directed by: Hervé Baillargeon (Canada, 2021) Cast: Noah Parker (Léon), Francesca Barcenas (Julietta), Alexandre Goyette (Francis), Anthony Therrien (Ricardo), Catherine Trudeau (Marianne), Amaryllis Tremblay (Florence), Léanne Désilets (Doris)

programme.title: Six degrés
programme.desc:
Episode 6: Tripping the night away
Ricardo and Léon are alone in the house. Ricardo makes the most of the opportunity to organise a little party with his friends, plus Florence and Doris.
Directed by: Hervé Baillargeon (Canada, 2021) Cast: Noah Parker (Léon), Francesca Barcenas (Julietta), Alexandre Goyette (Francis), Anthony Therrien (Ricardo), Catherine Trudeau (Marianne), Amaryllis Tremblay (Florence), Léanne Désilets (Doris)

programme.title: Six degrés
programme.desc:
Episode 7: When two hearts meet
Florence realises that Léon fancies her and she helps him to go through Francis's archives in search of information about Marianne. Léon discovers that his mother had been hiding an enormous secret.
Directed by: Hervé Baillargeon (Canada, 2021) Cast: Noah Parker (Léon), Francesca Barcenas (Julietta), Alexandre Goyette (Francis), Anthony Therrien (Ricardo), Catherine Trudeau (Marianne), Amaryllis Tremblay (Florence), Léanne Désilets (Doris)

programme.title: Six degrés
programme.desc:
Episode 8: Who were you?
Léon has returned to his former home with his grandfather. Francis comes clean with his son and tells him everything he needs to know about the relationship between Marianne and Violette.
Directed by: Hervé Baillargeon (Canada, 2021) Cast: Noah Parker (Léon), Francesca Barcenas (Julietta), Alexandre Goyette (Francis), Anthony Therrien (Ricardo), Catherine Trudeau (Marianne), Amaryllis Tremblay (Florence), Léanne Désilets (Doris)

programme.title: L'art a du chien, et du chat...
programme.desc:
Dogs and cats feature prominently in most museums and art galleries. But why do artists feel so inspired by them? What do these artworks reveal about the link that connects these domestic animals and mankind?

Directed by: Anka Schmid (Switzerland, 2021)
